education.name: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Palakkad
education.title: M.S. Research Scholar
description: Conducting research on Heterogeneous Continuous-Time Dynamic Graph Representation Learning (HT-Graph).
Developed a model to improve prediction performance and computational efficiency for large, dynamic, heterogeneous graphs.
Implemented neighbor-aware learning, neighbor-store, and restarter modules to enable parallel training and faster computations.
Achieved a 46.3% speedup over baseline models on a 2-GPU machine and improved average precision (AP) and AUC scores.

education.name: Kalyani Government Engineering College
education.title: B.Tech in Information Technology
description: Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Database Management Systems, Software Engineering.
Projects: Developed applications in Python, Java, and web technologies.
